DOC.brief_summary: This study assess pharmacokinetic profile , safety tolerability octreotide extend long-acting formulation single dose human . It investigate profile single dose drug healthy volunteer subject order understand time extent fluctuation octreotide concentration blood formulation , relationship drug concentration dose , long drug remain body system .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study Single Dose New Extended Long Acting Formulation Octreotide Pamoate Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female 1860 year age , cholecystectomized least 4 month prior start study . In good health determine past medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram laboratory test screen Body mass index within 1929 kg/m2 Able communicate well investigator comply requirement study . Exclusion criterion : Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory value screen , evidence clinically significant abnormal finding physical exam screening , significant illness within 2 week prior dose A past medical history clinically significant ECG abnormality family history prolong QTinterval syndrome History acute chronic bronchospastic disease ( include asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , treat untreated ) History clinically significant drug allergy , history atopic allergy , history clinical evidence pancreatic injury pancreatitis , clinical evidence liver disease liver injury , history presence impair renal function , history urinary obstruction difficulty urinate History immunocompromise , include positive HIV Known positive hepatitis B C surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C test result ( antiHCV ) History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose evidence abuse indicate laboratory assay screen Female subject pregnant lactating , childbearing potential without medically acceptable highly effective method birth control . Demonstrating intolerance octreotide baseline Any subject know history diabetes mellitus parent grandparent . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
